constantValues: Delivery Framework represents a management unit of work defined by the organization or entity doing the work. In IATI, the Delivery Framework is an “Activity.”

members.name: country

constantValues: Records the country related to the delivery framework.

members.description: Records the country related to the delivery framework.

constantValues: The type of Framwork, i.e. Program, Project, Initiative, Activity

foreignKeyAttribute.name: donorId

constantValues: This field contains the unique identifier for the donor.

members.name: goal

constantValues: Indicates the goal of the Framework.

members.description: Indicates the goal of the Framework.

constantValues: The name of the custom entity.

constantValues: Planned end date of the framework.

members.name: plannedStartDate

constantValues: Records the region related to the delivery framework.

constantValues: Records who will be reviewing the delivery framework.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Records who will be reviewing the delivery framework.

definitions.description: Delivery Framework represents a management unit of work defined by the organization or entity doing the work. In IATI, the Delivery Framework is an “Activity.”
